title: Electoral Process (Local Government elections) (Election Dates and Times of Poll) Order, 2016
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government
Gazette dated Friday, 14th October, 2016 837
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.70 OF2016
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(ActNo.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government Elections)
(Election Dates and Times of Poll) Order, 2016
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsections26and28ofthe
ElectoralProcessAct,2016,thefollowingOrderismade: Title
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local
Governmentelections)(ElectionDatesandTimesofPoll)Order,
2016.
2. Nominations for the election of a council chairperson and Nomination
councilorinthedistrictsandwardssetoutintheSchedulemaybe forelection
lodgedwiththereturningofficeronThursday,20thOctober,2016, times
between0900hoursand1500hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 20th Campaign
October,2016, at1500hoursandcloseat1800hoursonWednesday, period
16thNovember,2016.
4. Thepollfortheelectionofacouncilchairpersonandcouncilor Electiondate
inthedistrictsandwardssetoutintheScheduleshallbetakenon
Thursday, 17th November, 2016, between 0600 hours and 1800
hours,exceptthatapollshallnotbetakeninadistrictorwardin
whichonlyonecandidateisvalidlynominated.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101Lusaka.PriceK4.00each.
838 Statutory Instruments 14thOctober,2016
